sentence.text: Patients who are applying Panretin gel should not concurrently use products that contain DEET (N, N-diethyl-m-toluamide), a common component of insect repellent products.
sentence.negationtags: Patients who are applying Panretin gel should <scope> <cue> not </cue> concurrently use products that contain DEET (N, N-diethyl-m-toluamide), a common component of insect repellent products. </scope>

sentence.text: Animal toxicology studies showed increased DEET toxicity when DEET was included as proof of the formulation.

Although there was no clinical evidence in the vehicle-controlled studies of drug interactions with systemic antiretroviral agents, including protease inhibitors, macrolide antibiotics, and azole antifungals, the effect of Panretin gel on the steady-state concentrations of these drugs is not known.
sentence.negationtags: Although there was <scope> <cue> no </cue> clinical evidence in the vehicle-controlled studies of drug interactions with systemic antiretroviral agents, including protease inhibitors, macrolide antibiotics, and azole antifungals, the effect of Panretin gel on the steady-state concentrations of these drugs is not known. </scope>

sentence.text: No drug interaction data are available on concomitant administration of Panretin gel and systemic anti-KS agents.
sentence.negationtags: <scope> <cue> No </cue> drug interaction data are available on concomitant administration of Panretin gel and systemic anti-KS agents. </scope>
